subtitles.text: And now, it's time for our host, Bananaman, to welcome you to Nogizaka Construction Workshops!
You really have a worker's taste, don't you?
My dream is to be in the 4th or 5th term
The third captain of Super Axe
We challenge a project to shorten the distance with the junior students at once.
Tonight, she'll be working with the 4th term students
and challenge the past game challenges again!
We aim to break all records!
That's why we made a special order for their jerseys!
Because, you know, it stands out, doesn't it?
And if you fail in your assignment
Only the captain will take responsibility
You'll have to drink the Butt Drink 2023 series
I'll be doing this all week and all next week.
I'm gonna puke if I don't succeed.
The 4th term is still a dream...
But none of them are that close to each other.
You're the new captain all of a sudden.
What are you going to do?
Let's get to it... let's go!
We challenged the best member project.
This time, five fourth-term students and Umezawa
We're aiming for a new record!
I hope they'll take it all the way to the plums.
I'm sure you can do it.
We'll connect to Umezawa and see if we all get a hit.
If Endo fails, we've already failed.
As long as you hit it, you're good.
Endo, you're holding the bat like that.
Hold it short, hold it short!
You can read and listen too.
I'll be right next time... and first time too.
You'll have to decide at the end.
Do you think I should go first?
No, no, from this point of view...
I'm leading him by the nose.
All right, let's go for it.
Let the continuous toss batting begin!
A clean swing and a miss.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Well, I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to include one failure and a penalty drink.
So, the penalty drink for the captain is the new pink one!
It's a drink made from pickled plums
It's a drink made from pickled plums and vinegar.
Because it's made from plums and vinegar.
Wait a minute, everyone's in the mood for another round, but it's over.
We've been told by the staff to stop one more time.
Let's do it one more time.
So, as a favor to you, we'll have Umeza as the pop-up hitter, and we'll do the crying sign challenge.
I'm sure you can tell by looking at him.
I'm sorry... but I don't like pink.
You guys shouldn't say negative things about Nogizaka because they're going to be a new group that's going to make a big leap forward.
That's why I'm gonna guess! I'm gonna hit it!
I'll hit it rather than hit it!
Will the new captain and I unite our hearts and make it 6 in a row?
What the hell! Why is the downside already over?
He didn't give it to the juniors by his own musings!
But there's always the next one.
Next time, we'll have to liven it up.
You don't have to type, right?
This is another project with the best members.
Five of us lifted a barbell weighing a total of 110 kilograms.
We challenged the same record again this time.
Will the five of us work together to clear the record?
We did it, didn't we? We did it!
You were able to lift 20 last time, weren't you?
I think it was the 5 that failed.
We'll have to think of a way to make the 20 a little shorter.
Whoever can do it can do it.
I can lift up to two people in the chair section.
I'm going to chop it down to 22.54 people, 20 kilos, one person.
And just so you know, this is just one challenge.
Okay, who's going to go first?
It'll be a disaster if Ume doesn't make it.
I'm going to start with your chest down.
And up, straight up at the elbow.
Umezawa cleared 20 kilos last time. Can you lift 2.5 kilos?
I'm heavy. I was going to give it to you. I think I'm going to have to drink it.
I don't want to drink anymore.
22.5 kilos. I thought it would be harder than I thought.
Really? That's not the same as 20 kilos?
Tamura, are you okay? My cell phone just came on.
If he fails, he'll be out of the record books.
Here it comes, here it comes!
I'm sorry, I'm just trying to be supportive.
No, I was letting go of you when you just came up.
Because it was a close call.
But you were going up at the end.
Take a good look, Mr. Himura.
It was like this at the end.
In the middle... in the middle...
I said, "What are we going to do?" We'll take 20 each.
Me, too. I'm not sure how much I weigh.
I'm the most nervous I've been this year.
The most nervous I've been all year.
The pressure of a one-shot deal.
Let's see if Sameer can make it to the next one.
No problem. Here, here, this muscle.
And Matsuoka, do this here, and clear the last 20 kilometers.
I'd be scared if I had to lift two cheerleaders.
Wait a minute. These girls make mistakes.
Matsuo, who's done cheerleading before... will she be able to do it?
Go, go, go, go, go, go!
Now we have 20 kilometers to go. I'll be fine.
I think I'm okay. I have a lot of muscle.
The last time this happened, four of us worked together to lift 90 kilos.
For the first time, even the last man is deciding.
Can Shibata overcome the pressure and lift 20 kg for the new captain?
You did it, Ume! You did it!We did it, didn't we?
After all, if we work together, we can do it.
A well-known event in the show where the contestants try to see how many people they can get on a round platform.

This time, we challenged to break the record set during the Nogi Floor days. If 14 people could get on the platform and hold it for 5 seconds within the time limit of 3 minutes, it would be a new record.
The last time we did this, there were 13 people on the stage.
The last time we did it was in 2012.
But I'll go to the center.
Okay, let's see if we can clear the hole stage for 14 people.
Let's go! Ume's in the middle.
I'm going, I'm going, I'm going, I'm going, I'm going.
It's okay, it's okay, it's okay.
One and one and one and one and one.
Wait a minute... who's the last one?
Let me know when you're alone.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no...
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no...
How many times can you try if you have less than 3 minutes?
Two more minutes. Two more minutes.
One more person off-balance, and it's too close to call!
Can the 14 of us become one with one minute left?
It's not too late, it's not too late, it's not too late!
We can do it! We can do it!
Come on, come on, come on.
Maybe we should rebuild it again.
I can do it. I can do it.
I'm in, I'm in, I'm in.
End of the line, end of the line, end of the line.
Wow, that's great, that's great, that's great, that's great, that's great.
I could hear them saying, "This way, this way, this way," and it made me want to cry.
When the endo gets on at the end, he doesn't get on anymore.
And Kuromi was falling all over the place.
He was just standing there in the middle? Ume and others...
He had all kinds of people in his grasp.
I counted down louder than on New Year's Eve.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Isrilay time attackChair Relay Time Attack
The most exciting competition in chairland, the chair relay, was held over the chairs in the studio.
The first person lays out 10 chairs, and the second and third person make a lap around the course in caster chairs.
The fourth person is trying to set a new record for the time it takes to clear all the chairs.
The goal is to beat the previous record by 58 seconds!
What do you want me to do with it, in that order?
What's the order? Have you ever rolled over a chair?
Well, I do a lot of it in class, so...
It doesn't matter if we do it in class.
Why don't you go to class?
Last time, Kakki and I were in charge of carrying chairs.
So the chair-bearers are still here.
We'll set a new record by having the best chair carriers in the world.
Can we split them in half?
No, no, no. Last time, we had a go-between at the start of the race.
I'm not sure if you want me to sit in second.
Oh, that's how you do it.
It's okay, it's okay, it's okay.
I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay.
Let's see if the one in the back can go.
Too slow, too slow. You're too slow.
Go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
Put the top one in, then.
Even lining up the first persimmon...
It took a while to line up the first persimmon.
Atvia, the persimmon was the first to go.
Kurumi was running very slowly and gracefully.
No, Black Sea, you definitely should have gone backwards.
Today's third drink for Captain Umezawa is
Light green, the new color for spring!
You look like a guy drinking tequila on the beach.
I use it up in a week or so.
So you're totally fine with this?
I'm not going crazy around here, am I?
Write it down, write it down.
It's the first time for Kakki too.
I spent a lot of time away from them.
I didn't expect you to be so quick.
I felt like I was on a bullet train.
Why didn't you go to the back?
I was going so far back.
We're in the middle of a business.
Why did you do it in the middle of the business?
It's the end of the series.
If there's anything you want to do...
If there's something you want to do...
We can definitely go for this one.
We can switch the members around.
But if you want to go with this group...
If you want to go with this group...
He's the one who said that.
Can Umezawa and the 4th term members become one?
Then Kakki and Saya take the chairs, and Kuromi last.
Is there any way to open it?
The last chair, just before the tiles.
I can see the wood coming together.
It's amazing how thick it can get.
Will we set a new record?
I can do it. I can do it.
I love it, I love it, I love it, I love it, I love it
put it away, put it away
go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
not in yet not in yet not in yet not in yet not in yet
Well, the chair was a little out at the end...
Like that last one, the black one.Like that last one, black.
You can cut it down to less than a second... if you keep doing that last cone.
Wow, that was close. That was close.
But you did a great job.
I know, I know, I know. Next week we'll get closer to the 5th period.
